DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis 2 Months Daily Supplementation Orange juice fiber effect weight plasma lipid . This double-blind parallel control study . Study population include 50 subject , divide randomly two group . The first group get Orange juice fiber , second group get Orange juice fiber .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect 2 Months Daily Supplementation Orange Juice With Fibers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers Age 60 > 18 year Written inform consent Consumers orange drink : freshly squeeze juice , commercial pasteurize juice / orange soft drink Regular eating pattern Patients chronic disease sach : diabetes , cancer , C.O.P.D. , metabolic syndrome , weight , kidney failure , heart disease osteoporosis . Antibiotic treatment last 4 week Subjects regular probiotic prebiotic supplementation , unless subject 2 week wash commence study . Subjects intestinal disorder : IBD , IBS , celiac , colon cancer . Subjects intestinal surgery . Use medicine lower cholesterol ( simvastatin ) , sugar control Pregnancy Subjects abnormal baseline blood test result : liver function and/or kidney function , cholesterol level 200 mg/dL glucose level 50 mg/dL ( fast )
